page.title: 04Houses In Stanhope
page.content: About 2/3 of the homes in Stanhope have 3 bedrooms,about 1/6 of the homes have 4 bedrooms and 1/10 have 2 bedrooms. 2/3 of the population own their own homes,nearly 1/3 are rented from the council,the remainder, which is small, are privately rented. 4/5 of the houses have a telephone. Most houses have central heating, about 1/2 by gas,the rest by oil,electricity or solid fuel. The vast majority of houses have two storeys.There are a few bungalows and several old people's flats. Most houses have slate roofs.There are three council estates and most of the privately owned houses were built in Victorian times.The Victorian houses were built with local stone, and council houses are a mixture of red brick and pebble dash.
